nodes.label: Free education should be universal
nodes.span: Free higher education should be provided to all citizens.
nodes.paraphrase: Every person should have access to free university education.

nodes.label: Education reduces inequality
nodes.span: Studies show that access to education significantly reduces economic inequality.
nodes.paraphrase: Education is proven to decrease wealth gaps in society.

nodes.label: Cost is prohibitive
nodes.span: However, critics argue that free education would cost taxpayers billions.
nodes.paraphrase: Opponents claim the financial burden on taxpayers would be too high.

nodes.label: Investment pays off long-term
nodes.span: Yet this investment yields returns through increased tax revenues from educated workers.
nodes.paraphrase: The initial cost is offset by higher tax income from graduates.

nodes.label: Therefore, implement free education
nodes.span: Therefore, the benefits of free education outweigh the costs, and it should be implemented.
nodes.paraphrase: In conclusion, we should establish universal free education despite the expense.

meta.description: Test fixture with all 5 node types (claim, premise, objection, reply, conclusion) for legend verification
